00034 #define     ARMS_INV_ITEM_SELECTED                                                        0x00000001              // The item has been placed into the offer area
00035 //#define   ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_SELECTED                                    0x00000002              // The source location for the item has been selected

00039 #define     ARMS_INV_ITEM_REPAIRED                                                        0x00000020              // The item is repaired
00040 #define     ARMS_INV_JUST_PURCHASED                                                       0x00000040              // The item was just purchased
00041 #define     ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_BEEN_EVALUATED  0x00000080              // The Players item has been evaluated
